participant_1.background:
I try to do laundry once or twice a week.
i love going to the movies.
my mommy makes me a picnic lunch to eat outside.
i am short.
my father used to be a butcher.

participant_2.background:
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless.
i play quarterback.
I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm good, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and read books.
Me too! I love going to the movies, and I'm a huge reader. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, and I also enjoy reading books by Stephen King.
I love the Harry Potter series too! I haven't read any Stephen King books, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're really scary, but they're also really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for a living?
I'm a singer, and I also play quarterback.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a singer, but I'm not very good.
You should keep practicing! You might be surprised at how good you can get.
I'll try! Thanks for the encouragement!
